Reviews.Content: booked twin single throw bookingcom arriving proposed usual double extra payment hotel location center 5 minutes tram stop 2 stops dam square breakfast wifi perfect nice bed nice stay days

Reviews.Title: “"a super little hotel"”
Reviews.Author: Niallobyrne
Reviews.Content: night stay amsterdam stayed hampshire hotel prinsengracht wasnt surprised hotel lovely fantastic location walking amsterdam bathroom spotless stayed called 4 star hotels amsterdam hold candle gem staff helpful friendly recommend hotel stay visit business trip return hotel wife walking distance flower main shopping district

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable and well located”
Reviews.Author: Lucy_getaway
Reviews.Content: stayed overlooking garden 3 nights peaceful wonderful windows looking garden requested triple disappointed bed king size armchair converted single bed comfortable left little space luggage despite enjoyed stay prinsengracht location fantastic selection restaurants bars cafes minutes walk close rembrandt square staff friendly helpful

Reviews.Title: “Tiny Canal side house”
Reviews.Author: Bob A
Reviews.Content: reviews hotel praised view etc experience opposite tiny hotel touch walls outstretched arms smelt damp quiet nights sleep tiny tv poor quality lasting memories

Reviews.Title: “Great Location”
Reviews.Author: didaka
Reviews.Content: hotel 10 minutes walking distance dam square rembrandtplein museum district close tram stop basic clean facing canal booked twin surprised received keys reception desk girl told twin called standard dutch ie consist tiny common bathroom staff helpful hotel perfect couple days

Reviews.Title: “Nice location, nice hotel, but rubbish sleep!”
Reviews.Author: elleSearcher
Reviews.Content: positive hotel location central fairly quiet street prinsengracht perfect base discovering city foot basis didnt eat hotel reception staff friendly basic acceptable negative main stairwell stairs wooden hear resulted rubbish sleep 3 nights boyfriend light sleeper wasnt affected buy earplugs book floor rear property corner noise issues sorry cant remember

Reviews.Title: “perfect location”
Reviews.Author: valeriasanf
Reviews.Content: hotel nice little little cold perfect prinsengracht beautiful surroundings nice close centre wait outside hotel minute bus central station

Reviews.Title: “Basic, clean good value”
Reviews.Author: sydneytraveller5000
Reviews.Content: stayed 2 nights clean view canal taxi train station 10e location 10 min walk didnt breakfast hotel cant comment hired bikes day 10e staff friendly amsterdam amsterdam hotel hotel clean clean bathroom friendly service value money recommend hotel

Reviews.Title: “Good clean, friendly central location”
Reviews.Author: Lane2008
Reviews.Content: spend days april found hampshire inn ideal short city break sights wished walking distance location ideal clean serviced daily faced onto canal lovely staff helpful friendly definately recommend

Reviews.Title: “Good but could do better”
Reviews.Author: jennykenny
Reviews.Content: pleasant hotel friendly staff fairly central nice bars restaurants close reasonable breaksfast nice little garden bathroom thorough makeover blocked sink fixed complained plug sink fan black mould removing people staying mid march heavy footsteps floor noisy season tram 4 central station takes road prinsengracht 4 minutes walk amsterdam local food stick indonesian thai
